revised_title: Observations on the Development, Color Patterns, and Breeding of Discoglossus Pictus
tldr: This article discusses the observations made on Discoglossus pictus, a type of amphibian, during the last 15 years in captivity. The author explores the species' breeding patterns, color patterns, and the importance of egg debris in the development of the larvae. The study also investigates the inheritance of color patterns through various crosses between different subspecies.
